114.content: Why would an adult Clementine be wearing diapers?
114.title: late teens early 20's(season 4)

1141.content: Was Clementine by herself or was she with other humans?
1141.title: She was incontinent

choices: Dressed for the cold (jackets, multiple layers, etc)
Dressed for the heat (tank top, skirt, thinner clothnig, etc)
11411.content:
When the zombie apocalypse first started, Clementine was just a young girl with some bladder issues. Over the years, her issues went untreated and by the time she was 20, she had become fully incontinent. Even so, she'd joined several survivor groups and while they would always crumble or get killed, Clem would always come out alive and kicking. Even with a thick diaper strapped to her waist, she'd find a way to fight back and survive in this world.

When Clem was younger she was able to find diapers for her condition fairly easily, but now as an adult its getting harder and harder. She was on her own, and while her food and water supply was fine for the moment, her diaper stash was getting low and she was going to need a change soon. Clementine had gotten used to staying in the diaper for long periods of time, to preserve her diaper supply. Luckily walkers didn't seem very attracted by the smell of a dirty diaper, so Clem didn't have to worry about them.

How was Clem dressed while she was on her supply run?
11411.title: Alone

choices: Keep the diaper on while she searched
114112.content:
It was a hot, humid Georgia summer and Clem was dressed in just a tank top, a skirt, and adult diaper, and her favorite hat, all soaked with sticky summer sweat. The skirt was short so it wouldn't inhibit her movement, though this meant that when her diaper was as full as it was at the moment, it was drooping past Clems hemline and was partially visible. As often as she'd had to explain this to people, Clem was always embarrassed by this. For as much as she'd been through, she was still embarrassed to be an adult woman in a dangerous world forced to wear and use diapers like a toddler.

Clementine arrived in what appeared to be an abandoned town. She found a hospital, and knew she could find some diapers in her size there. Hospitals carried adult incontinence briefs for multiple reasons. While food and medicine surely would have been looted by then, she was sure that no one would have taken the diapers. She checked her own diaper, and found it was almost completely full, moist and heavy from repeated usage. Clementine decided to....
114112.title: Dressed for the heat (tank top, skirt, thinner ...

choices: Diapers of various colors with childish prints on them
1141122.content:
Clementine was running low on diapers, so she decided raid the hospital while still wearing the soaked garment currently strapped to her crotch. She shattered the glass on the front door, in case she needed an easy escape, and started searching the halls of the hospital. As she walked the halls of the hospital, her saturated diaper would rub against her inner thigh, squishing between her legs. "Hope don't get into a fight" she had thought to herself. "This diaper is NOT ideal for escaping." She was beginning to think she should have just changed in the first place.

On the very first floor, she found a large storage room. It had already been broken into, and most of the actual medicine and surgical tools had already been stolen. Clem had expected this, and she wasn't after those. She found what she was looking for in the back corner of the storage room: multiple boxes of "adult incontinence briefs". There were five of them at least, and they were huge. "I could keep myself diapered for a whole year with this stash!" Clem whispered to herself excitedly.

She popped open the first box and found....
1141122.title: Keep the diaper on while she searched

choices: Collect ad put on the princess diapers
Search the rest of the hospital
11411222.content: Clem pulled the diapers out and discovered that they were bright pink with cartoon princesses on the cover and little butterflies on both sides. "What the hell? Why would something like this be in a hospital?" she whispered to herself. She explored the rest of the storage room but as far as she could tell, the princess diapers were the only ones there. She put her hand on her own diaper and found it soggy and full, almost to the point of leaking. Clem looked at the box and decided....
11411222.title: Diapers of various colors with childish prints ...

choices: Leave the room with just her diaper visable
search the hospital for something to cover herself up
114112221.content:
Clementine reluctantly decided that, even if there WERE other diapers somewhere in the hospital, she shouldn't let these go to waste when she was in such desperate need for a change. She untaped the diaper from her waist and let it hit the floor with a loud *SLAP* and removed her skirt. She got a cloth and soap from her pack and thoroughly cleaned her her diaper area. Clem also found some talcum powder in the storage room, and did not hesitate to salvage it, coating a thick layer of the stuff on her privates and inner thighs.

She pulled one of the babyish garments out of the box and reluctantly taped it tightly onto her body. She walked around to get feel for these new diapers, and was surprised with how thick they felt. She did a few aerobic exercises in the room to test how much they would hinder her movement if she were in a pinch. "I guess these will be fine" she admitted. Clems cheeks were burning in embarrassment. After being forced to have her potty training deteriorated through her childhood and teens, and now into early adulthood, she was now forced to wet and soil herself in diapers that made her look as much like a giant baby as she felt.

She pulled her skirt up and found that it was too small to fit around the diaper she was now wearing. "Damnit! How am I going to cover this stupid thing up now?"
114112221.title: Collect ad put on the princess diapers

1141122211.content:
Clem picked up her skirt and packed it in her bag, along with as many diapers as she could carry. Her plan was to raid one of the shops around town for larger skirts to fit over her new bulkier diapers. Despite the new padding between her legs, Clem was just as quick and agile as she ever was. She'd learned how to handle quick escapes with heavily used diapers, so this thicker poof wrapped around her waist didn't change much.

She almost made it to the exit, but there was a figure in the doorway. The light from outside had obscured the shape, but upon closer inspection, Clem could tell it was....
1141122211.title: Leave the room with just her diaper visable

11411222112.content: who was the figure in the doorway that Clem saw?
11411222112.title: A human

114112221121.content: Did she try to talk with her, though?
114112221121.title: violet

1141122211211.content:
"I-It's... Umm... I" Clem try to explain.
"Shhhh... It's ok" Violet smiled and hugged Clem. "I Can take care of everything" Violet said.
1141122211211.title: Yeah

info.brief_description: girls from the shows and games are diapered
info.description:
the girls from the walking dead, fear the walking dead, and the walking dead games end up in diapers. why is up to you.

Rule 1. no killing off characters.
Rule 2. don't end a story path before it's actually started.(I will delete those)
Rule 3. no insulting religion.
Rule 4. no weight gain.

have fun:)
